summary: Provides core infrastructure for Django management commands, including custom exceptions, a refined argument parser, base classes for commands that operate on apps or label arguments, an output wrapper for styled console I/O, and utilities for processing default command options.
business_intent: Offer a reusable, extensible framework that standardizes error handling, option parsing, output styling, and systemâ€‘check integration for custom Django management commands, enabling developers to focus on command-specific logic.
